name: easy-sipjs
description: Abstração simplificada do SIP.js para projetos WebRTC.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:beta: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:gh: gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") dist/easy-sip.min.js dist/easy-sip.min.js.map --generate-notes
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && mv README.md README.gh.md && cp NPM.md README.md

author: Paulo Souza <paulo18santos2000@gmail.com>
